synopsis.text:
In the realm of Ame no Kisaki Catholic school, Miyamae Kanako, a high school girl with an unusual allergy to boys, embarks on a quest to find her soulmate of the same sex. Inspired by her parents' love story, she transfers to this all-girls school, hoping to escape the hive-inducing males and find her perfect match. However, her dream turns into a chaotic reality when she encounters the charming Shidou Mariya, who seems to be the embodiment of her ideal partner. But there's a twist - Mariya is actually a mischievous boy disguised as a girl!

To protect his secret and avoid expulsion, Mariya threatens Kanako and decides to keep her under constant surveillance, making her life a living nightmare. As if this wasn't enough, Kanako finds herself entangled in a web of complicated relationships. Ryuuken, the most popular girl in school, vows to protect her, while Kiri claims to be dating Kanako to prevent bullying. Amidst all this, Kanako must navigate through the challenges of her new school life while trying to find her true love. Will she be able to survive the chaos and find her dream girl, or will Mariya's antics prove to be too much for her to handle? Only time will tell in this rollercoaster ride of love, laughter, and confusion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
